staxel.village.character.dialogue.MaxRoo: I know I should show my face more at mealtimes, but I'm sure you can understand.
My workload is such that I hardly have time to eat, let alone do so at fixed hours!
I don't mean to leave papers everywhere!
It's just hard to find the time to clean them up and those mounds never seem to shrink...
Can we really afford to live in this home, in this town?
Even as a heritage site, finances are rather tight right now...
